name: Curve Yield Seeker
description: Supplies {{token}} to [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi) to earn CRV. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy. Strategy automatically switches to the most profitable Curve pool.

en.name: Curve Yield Seeker
en.description: Supplies {{token}} to [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi) to earn CRV. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy. Strategy automatically switches to the most profitable Curve pool.

fr.name: Curve Yield Seeker
fr.description: Fournit du {{token}} sur [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi) pour gagner du CRV. Les jetons gagnés sont récoltés, vendus pour plus de {{token}} qui sont ensuite redéposés dans la stratégie. La stratégie dépose automatiquement à le pool Curve la plus rentable.
